title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka masala spice for 2 hours.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked through.
In a large pan, melt butter and saut√© onions until golden.
Add garlic, ginger, and remaining spices, cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend the sauce until smooth, return to pan.
Add cream and chicken, simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
In a blender, combine garlic, anchovies, egg yolk, lemon juice, and mustard.
Blend while slowly drizzling in olive oil until emulsified.
Season dressing with salt and pepper.
Toss lettuce with dressing in a large bowl.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious Mexican tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water as directed on packet.
Simmer for 5 minutes until mixture thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and onions.
Serve with sour cream and salsa on the side.
